name: Named Bullet, Greater
components: V, S, M/DF (an item from the selected creature or creature type)
target: one piece of ammunition or one thrown weapon
text: This spell functions like named bullet, except it deals 2 extra points of damage per caster level (maximum 40).
duration_zh: 10分钟/等级 或 直至能量发散
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害, 物体)
text_zh: 这个法术工作方式如同指名狙杀 (Named Bullet)，但是它会造成每施法者等级2点的额外伤害 (最高40)。
